text: int max ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , k , l , m , temp1 , temp2 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; memset ( a , - 1 , n * n * 4 ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( k = 1 ; k < n ; ++ k ) { i = n - k ; j = i - 1 ; l = i ; m = j ; while ( i > 0 ) { a [ l - 1 ] [ j ] = max ( a [ l ] [ i ] + a [ m ] [ j ] , a [ l ] [ i - 1 ] + a [ m ] [ j ] ) ; i -- ; j -- ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
